data.finding_summary: Initial searches revealed that Jiangsu Provincial Hospital of Chinese Medicine (江苏省中医院) is the primary affiliated hospital of Nanjing University of Chinese Medicine (南京中医药大学), a separate institution from the target, Nanjing University (南京大学). However, two indirect connections were identified. First, in February 2022, Nanjing University was one of several universities that signed a "science and education talent health service cooperation agreement" with the hospital's new Zidong campus to provide healthcare services to university personnel. Second, in June 2022, the Nanjing University Overseas Chinese Federation (南京大学侨联) co-organized a free health clinic event where medical staff from Jiangsu Provincial Hospital of Chinese Medicine provided services. This was a community event, not a direct institutional partnership between the university and the hospital. No evidence of joint academic research, formal affiliation, or shared funding between Nanjing University and Jiangsu Provincial Hospital of Chinese Medicine was found.
data.potential_intermediary_B: Nanjing University Overseas Chinese Federation (南京大学侨联), Nanjing Municipal Overseas Chinese Federation (南京市侨联)
